title: Capitalize First Letter in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore a JavaScript function called capitalize that capitalizes the first letter of a string. The function uses array destructuring and String.prototype.toUpperCase() to achieve the desired result. We will also see how to use the lowerRest argument to convert the rest of the string to lowercase if needed.

meta.title: JavaScript | Capitalize First Letter | String Manipulation
meta.description: Learn how to use a JavaScript function to capitalize the first letter of a string, with optional conversion of the rest of the string to lowercase. Explore array destructuring and String.prototype.toUpperCase().
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Capitalize, String, First Letter, Manipulation, Array Destructuring, toUpperCase
